entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow this morning. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 90 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
